[On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of your deck in any order. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your {The Seven Warlords of the Sea} type Leader or Character cards.

name: Gum-Gum Mole Pistol
effect: [Main] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −5000 power during this turn. Then, if you have a Character with 6000 power or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 2000 power or less.
trigger: [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.
